text: The Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Concepción () is an archdiocese in Concepción, Chile. == History == It was established in 1563 as Diocese of La Imperial. On 1603, it was renamed Diocese of Concepción. On 1939 it was promoted to Archdiocese of Concepción. == Suffragan dioceses == * Chillán * Los Ángeles * Temuco * Valdivia * Villarrica == Other websites == * Giga- Catholic Information * Catholic Hierarchy * Diocese website Category:1563 establishments Concepcion Category:Organisations based in Concepción Category:1560s establishments in South America Category:16th-century establishments in Chile
title: Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Concepción
